name: Our Will - Jötunheim
description:
A narrative adventure with turn-based combat, about a young girl tasked with leading a small company of warriors, into an unknown and mystical land, in search of a cure to save their village.

This is a game about the lengths of human courage and will and the greyish line that most of the time separates good and bad decisions. It’s a game about the human relation with the divine and religion and how it perceives its role in the world.

The game is set in a Scandinavian world, embedded deep in Norse mythology and magical beings.

The game is currently in development.

Team:

André Antunes - Narrative, Programming

Diogo Mendonça - Programming

Joana Barbosa - Art

João Pamplona - Programming

Maria Gomes - Narrative, Programming

Maria Vieira - Art

Mariana Santos - Art

Tiago Martins - Art
